execution_plan.description: Search the store_main database for products whose name contains 'USB' (case-insensitive). Return product-level fields and placeholders to align with the remote items schema.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id::text AS product_id, name AS product_name, sku AS sku_or_code, price AS price_dollars, NULL::INTEGER AS amount_in_cents, is_active::text AS active_flag, created_at AS created_at, category_id, NULL::INTEGER AS group_ref, 'store_main' AS source_database FROM products WHERE name ILIKE '%USB%';

execution_plan.description: Search the store_alt database for items whose title contains 'USB' (case-insensitive). Return item-level fields and placeholders to align with the main products schema.
execution_plan.query: SELECT code::text AS product_id, title AS product_name, code::text AS sku_or_code, NULL::numeric(10,2) AS price_dollars, amount_in_cents, active AS active_flag, created_on::timestamp AS created_at, NULL::BIGINT AS category_id, group_ref, 'store_alt' AS source_database FROM items WHERE title ILIKE '%USB%';
